p: The permutation model was also extensively used by some authors [ 41, 36, 54]. Nevertheless, it has a disadvantage due to the shape of the clusters constrained by the cylindrical shape (with a circular base) of the window used to scan the studied area. This could lead to a serious constraint when the geographical extension of the detected clusters is large [ 40]. The method detects only outbreaks that start locally, not those that occur more or less simultaneously in the whole surveillance area.
